item.description:
Our first dinner in February was a smash - 18 men and 18 women attended. - there's been many requests to do it up bigger a second time, here goes........
Details:
This is a progressive dinner where the men will change tables at each course. This gives everyone a chance to spend time and have conversation with new friends. The goal is to have equal numbers of men and women. Our private dining room will have 7 tables of 8 or so, depending on our count. If you're a man, go ahead and give your "yes" rsvp. If you're a woman that would like to attend, you must bring a +1 man ie. your brother, friend, co-worker......(not a date). When you rsvp "yes" list the first name of your male guest. Your +1 RSVP requires a $10 reservation fee to be applied to the evening cost of $34.50. The +1 guest will be required to pay $34.50 at the door.

Upon arrival there will be a cocktail hour - cash bar, followed by a 4 course sit down dinner.
We will hold the event regardless of attendence numbers or gender mix


Dinner:

Frank's Steakhouse owner, George Ravanis has put together a special 4-course dinner for the evening. Grilled chicken over steamed spinach and chantilly potato entree. Vegan and vegetarian alternatives available. Complete price including all courses, dessert, coffee and soft drinks........$34.50pp.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Plus One Progressive Dinner Party- Redux
